I'm having a similar issue in a 4 GPU containerized machine. If I run single job in the node taking 1 GPU, everything works fine. However, if I run two concurrent jobs in the same node, each takes 1 GPU, it ends in
E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_DEINITIALIZED
This happens when the job has finished the container is being stopped.

I'm having a similar issue in a 4 GPU containerized machine. If I run single job in the node taking 1 GPU, everything works fine. However, if I run two concurrent jobs in the same node, each takes 1 GPU, it ends in 
`E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_DEINITIALIZED`
This happens when the job has finished the container is being stopped.
